attributes.action: refuse to grant Nigel Martin a Peerage
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Nigel Martin, the only speaker of the House of Commons in over 300 years, forced to resign is being tipped to be knighted. I saw this is in the same vein as the expenses scandal. Mr Martin can go back to sheet metal work, after all, this is what he was trained for.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
